document.full_text: bahrain's king declared martial law on tuesday as his government struggled to quell an uprising by the island's shi'ite muslim majority that has drawn in troops from fellow sunni-ruled neighbor saudi arabia.
document.title: bahrain declares martial law, violence flares
lines_and_colors: bahrain's king declared martial law on tuesday as his government struggled to quell an uprising by the island's shi'ite muslim majority that has drawn in troops from fellow sunni-ruled neighbor saudi arabia.
